original_text: For with what judgment ye judge, ye shall be judged: and with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you again.
korean_text: 너희가 비판하는 그 비판으로 너희가 비판을 받을 것이요 너희가 헤아리는 그 헤아림으로 너희가 헤아림을 받을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For with what judgment ye judge
and with what measure ye mete
it shall be measured to you again
